text: Gei meemaa ga helekai, “Go di God o digau Hebrew dela ne haga modongoohia Ia mai gi gimaua. Malaa, dugua gimaadou gii hula i nia laangi e dolu i lodo henua, e daumaha gi Yihowah go di madau God, idimaa, ma ga hagalee hai go gimaadou beenei, gei Mee ga hagaduadua gimaadou gi tau magi huaidu, be gi tauwa.”
